Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: Mark King
Reviews.Content: It seems like you can never have enough of these around. I like these little 10-packs, now I have lots of adaptors and never run out.

Reviews.Title: Just like the expensive ones
Reviews.Author: Video expert
Reviews.Content: These fit perfectly and will not vibrate off.  Good spring compression but still allows you to remove them.  Price is right and quality is great but would have given 5 stars if the wait time was shorter.

Reviews.Title: Handy connectors to have around
Reviews.Author: Michael Warren
Reviews.Content: I only needed 2 of these, but the pack of ten was the cheapest per-unit on Amazon at the time. They shipped via China Post. One or two didn't twist on the first try... I didn't throw them away (It could have been my fault...) but I would suggest buying a few more than you plan on using.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: These work well and actually are better made than some gold plated ones I had bought previously.  Gets the job done for a good price.... and especially for a part that is relatively uncommon in local stores.

Reviews.Title: just what I ordered
Reviews.Author: A. Brumbaugh
Reviews.Content: Don't know what to say, other then the shipping was fast and they work fine....just as expected. Price is great as well. I would give it 5 stars, but to say that I love a RCA to BNC adapter feels wrong.

Reviews.Title: Practical
Reviews.Author: Mr Neil
Reviews.Content: The RCA Female Jack to BNC Male Plug Adapters do what they are supposed to do. I needed something to perform this task and here it is.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: Allison J. Parmalee
Reviews.Content: I needed these for installation of a 16 channel CCTV system with sound.  Had to extend leads, etc.  They worked well .  I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic and solved my Wii problem
Reviews.Author: Michael D Pelham
Reviews.Content: Theses were the perfect solution I had been looking for to connect my Wii to a tv that had the BNC style connectors . There are plenty of WAY more expensive solutions on the market but just using these on the end of my wii cable worked flawlessly!

Reviews.Title: good jack
Reviews.Author: Michael S.
Reviews.Content: The jacks worked as advertised and were of good quality. I had one jack out of 10 that did not make as good a connection as the others.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Matilda Swenskie
Reviews.Content: glad to find this here on Amazon.  Our local hardware stores, including the "big chain"  stores (Home Depot, and Lowes, Radio shack), none of them had these, and had NO idea what we even needed.  Even showed them pictures of this item, and all 3 chain stores, said they don't carry these, and if we could get them online, then better buy them!  Save yourself the time of searching all over your hometown stores........just buy these and they work!

Reviews.Title: Did not work!
Reviews.Author: hwanb
Reviews.Content: Did not work on RCA cable I needed. Luckily the person I bought the monitor sent better adapters that did work.  Not sure these didn't work.

Reviews.Title: good product...fast del. by this supplier
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: fast delivery, 4 days great product, very low price...I bought the 10 for what most stores sell 1 for, just make sure u buy from this place if u like to get them fast, I tried a few other places on amazon and it takes about 3 weeks....

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I got what I wanted from this order. It was simple and I don't have easy access to this kind of adapter locally.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Richard Hoag
Reviews.Content: workeds as expected good deal what i would expect well made product and fit nicely atta boy roy thank you so much

Reviews.Title: RCA Female Jack to BNC Male Plug Adapters Pack of 10
Reviews.Author: walter loggins
Reviews.Content: The RCA to BNC adapters arrived within the advertised date and were well made.  They fit all my connectors without any problem.

Reviews.Title: These are sturdy looking.
Reviews.Author: Don A. Jones
Reviews.Content: I expect long life with minimal movements (plugging & unplugging) .... heavy use will naturally wear any contacts, plating thickness and quality extend life.

Reviews.Title: Jack to BNC Adapters
Reviews.Author: Deborah L. Deuel
Reviews.Content: Product was as described and arrived promptly. Used to adapt our nest cam cables to new DVR so we can record bird behavior and health and safety of our nestlings . Free shipping is a plus for small items like these.

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: JACK
Reviews.Content: PROD OKAS W / MOST PARTS FROM VALLEYSLOW SHIP TIME AS W / MOST VALLEY .. . . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Good choice, and good price
Reviews.Author: L. G. Macias Sanchez "Lgmaciasler"
Reviews.Content: This adapter let me use a video cameras with standard RCA output, in a Home Security Surveillance System that only have BNC female inputs.

Reviews.Title: Quality matches the price
Reviews.Author: Jerry Cordell
Reviews.Content: I wanted a little better quality, but it matches the price I paid for them. The internal conector is 2 parts that could wear out over time, The radio shack ones are one solid conector, but they are about $5 each.

Reviews.Title: Good Price
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Great purchase. Fast and will also recommend to friends and family. Will defenetly order again from this site .Nice product

Reviews.Title: F16Lumpy
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Falkenstein
Reviews.Content: Product is exactly what I need to complete my project. Cabling for home security systems needs accessories to connect cameras to processors, and using these connectors completes this process.

Reviews.Title: Well Made Connectors
Reviews.Author: Dr. Dave "Dr. Dave"
Reviews.Content: This product is well constructed with the best materials and excellent workmanship.This is a recommended product for you to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Update connectors on an older HD TV
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I have an older Panasonic TV that only has BNC component connectors.  As a result I could not use the DirecTV receiver with the TV.  These connectors solved that problem.  With these attached standard component cables work fine with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: BodyfromCotati "USA"
Reviews.Content: I bought these to hook up a security system for my home because Barack Obama is an Idiot and crime is rampant and no one is safe from him. I also use these to help spot Illegal Aliens and deport them.

ProductInfo.Features:
RCA Female Jack to BNC Male Plug Adapter
Pack of 10
ProductInfo.Name: RCA Female Jack to BNC Male Plug Adapters Pack of 10
